subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Doug Melvin will get a three-year contract extension as the general manager of the Milwaukee Brewers, but the team also said that Dale Sveum was no longer under consideration to become manager. Sveum was promoted from his coaching position and served as interim manager after Ned Yost was fired with 12 games left in the regular season. The Brewers reached the postseason for the first time since 1982, but lost to Philadelphia in the opening round of the playoffs.
